<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### tryAddingSymbolicOperand() {#aadc518cf2b179163c8eca58f17e333b2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64ExternalSymbolizer::tryAddingSymbolicOperand (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; CommentStream, int64&#95;t Value, uint64&#95;t Address, bool IsBranch, uint64&#95;t Offset, uint64&#95;t OpSize, uint64&#95;t InstSize)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
tryAddingSymbolicOperand - tryAddingSymbolicOperand trys to add a symbolic operand in place of the immediate <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>.

The immediate <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> has not had any PC adjustment made by the caller. If the instruction is a branch that adds the PC to the immediate <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> then isBranch is Success, else Fail. If GetOpInfo is non-null, then it is called to get any symbolic information at the Address for this instrution. If that returns non-zero then the symbolic information it returns is used to create an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> and that is added as an operand to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>. If <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexternalsymbolizer/#a2307af972a75c070da7242a59df69859">GetOpInfo()</a> returns zero and isBranch is Success then a symbol look up for Address + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is done and if a symbol is found an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> is created with that, else an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> with Address + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is created. If <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexternalsymbolizer/#a2307af972a75c070da7242a59df69859">GetOpInfo()</a> returns zero and isBranch is Fail then the Opcode of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> is tested and for ADRP an other instructions that help to load of pointers a symbol look up is done to see it is returns a specific reference type to add to the comment stream. This function returns Success if it adds an operand to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> and Fail otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64externalsymbolizer-h/#l00030">30</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64externalsymbolizer-h">AArch64ExternalSymbolizer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64externalsymbolizer-cpp/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64externalsymbolizer-cpp">AArch64ExternalSymbolizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
